pkgmetadata.longdescription: Attribute profile estimation using Diagnostic Classification Models and MCMC // Analysis of dichotomous response data to obtain attribute profile estimates for respondents using Diagnostic Classification Model (DCM) and Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) method. The estimation procedure uses a loglinear cognitive diagnostic modeling (LDCM) framework that allows for the estimation of a host of DCMs such as NIDO, NIDA, NC-RUM etc.
